title: When Did Christians Begin Advent Celebrations?

media:group.media:title: When Did Christians Begin Advent Celebrations?
media:group.media:description:
When in history did the celebration of Advent begin in Christian churches? This short explanation tells how Advent arose around Christmas in the 4th century, and how Advent in history is different than Advent today. 

Ryan M. Reeves (PhD Cambridge) is Assistant Professor of Historical Theology at Gordon-Conwell Theological Seminary.  Twitter: https://twitter.com/RyanMReeves       Instagram: https://instagram.com/ryreeves4/
